=====================
Path Sampling (PaSam)
=====================

PaSam is a python3 implementation of a path sampling tool. It's primary
application is to characterize delivery schemes in dynamic trajectory
radiotherapy (DTRT).

-------------

https://pasam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
